Jiawei Chen is currently a Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Aeronautical and Aviation Engineering (AAE) at The Hong Kong Polytechnic University (PolyU), under the supervision of Dr. Gangyan XU. She obtained her Bachelor of Engineering in Automation from Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen, China, in 2022. Jiawei's research focuses on the intersection of machine learning and other disciplines, particularly in learning-based optimization, cooperative AI, and machine learning-driven control. During her Ph.D., she has worked extensively on reinforcement learning (RL) for combinatorial optimization, real-time optimization and deployment in healthcare and emergency scenarios, as well as predictive control and energy optimization in energy systems.

title: Jiawei Chen
text: Sep 2022 - Present: Ph.D. Candidate, INSys Group, The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, Hong Kong, China. Sep 2018 - Aug 2022: Bachelor of Engineering in Automation, Harbin Institute of Technology, Shenzhen, China.

title: 中文简历
text: 陈家苇，女，博士在读。2022年毕业于哈尔滨工业大学（深圳）机电工程与自动化学院，获自动化专业工学学士学位。2022年秋季至今，就读于香港理工大学航空及民航工程学系，预计于2026年6月毕业。研究方向为人工智能驱动的优化决策，预测控制等，成果见诸 IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems, Management Science, Advanced Engineering Informatics, IEEE Transactions on Automation Science and Engineering 等期刊。
